original_text: He looked David over and saw that he was little more than a boy, glowing with health and handsome, and he despised him.
korean_text: 그 블레셋 사람이 둘러보다가 다윗을 보고 업신여기니 이는 그가 젊고 붉고 용모가 아름다움이라

sentences.original_text: and saw that he was little more than a boy
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 소년에 불과하다는 것을 보았다
